com.crudetech.lang

Class Compare

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crudetech.lang.Compare

  • public final class Compare
extends Object
    Simple helper class that offers standard comparing functionality with additional null checks

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(double lhs,
             double rhs,
             double tol)
        Compares to double values for equality within a given tolerance.
        Parameters:
        lhs - The first value to compare.
        rhs - The second value to compare.
        tol - The tolerance in between which two values are considered to be equal.
        Returns:
        TRUE, if both values are equal within the given tolerance, FALSE otherwise.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(double lhs,
             double rhs)
        Compares to double values for equality within a tolerance of 1e-6.
        Parameters:
        lhs - The first value to compare.
        rhs - The second value to compare.
        Returns:
        TRUE, if both values are equal within the given tolerance, FALSE otherwise.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(Iterable<?> lhs,
             Iterable<?> rhs)
        Compares two Iterables by comparing each item.
        Parameters:
        lhs - The first range to be compared.
        rhs - The second range to be compared.
        Returns:
        TRUE if each item in lhs equals the corresponding item in rhs. FALSE otherwise.

      • equals

        public static <T> boolean equals(Iterable<? extends T> lhs,

        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        lhs - The first range to be compared.
        rhs - The second range to be compared.
        comp - The comparer to be used for comparisons.
        Returns:
        TRUE if each item in lhs equals the corresponding item in rhs. FALSE otherwise.
